action.action-desc: Mr. Mann introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require congressional approval of certain actions, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 4(a) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1533(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: A listing, removal from a list, or change in status of any species under this subsection shall take effect upon enactment of a congressional joint resolution of approval.
